tagline: Don’t read a resume. Test my fit.
subtagline: See how my skills, systems, and work align with your role.
builtByLine: This evaluation system was built by Calum Kershaw.

howItWorks.title: Paste or upload a job description
howItWorks.body: Bring a role description and a bit of context about what success looks like.

howItWorks.title: Have a short guided conversation
howItWorks.body: The agent asks open-ended prompts to understand the role and environment.

howItWorks.title: Get a clear YES/NO + reasoning
howItWorks.body: You’ll receive a structured report with fit, risks, and success conditions.
